description: Austin is the vibrant capital of Texas, known for its live music scene, fantastic food, and the slogan 'Keep Austin Weird'. The city perfectly blends urban sophistication with Texas charm.

climate.rainfall: Moderate, heaviest in spring and fall

highlights: Live music capital of the world
Incredible BBQ and food truck scene

topAttractions.name: Texas State Capitol
topAttractions.description: Free tours of the beautiful state capitol building with grounds larger than the US Capitol

topAttractions.name: Lady Bird Lake
topAttractions.description: Urban lake perfect for kayaking, paddleboarding, and hiking/biking trails

topAttractions.name: South Congress Bridge Bats
topAttractions.description: World's largest urban bat colony - over 1.5 million bats emerge at sunset

topAttractions.name: Zilker Park
topAttractions.description: 78-acre park hosting festivals and offering recreational activities

foodScene.foodTrucks: Over 1,000 food trucks throughout the city - try East Austin food truck parks
foodScene.breakfastTacos: Austin institution - available everywhere, especially gas stations

music.liveMusic: Over 250 venues with live music - many with no cover charge

neighborhoods.name: Downtown
neighborhoods.description: Business district with nightlife on 6th Street and Red River

neighborhoods.name: South Congress (SoCo)
neighborhoods.description: Trendy area with shopping, dining, and 'Keep Austin Weird' culture

neighborhoods.name: East Austin
neighborhoods.description: Hip, artistic neighborhood with galleries, music venues, and food

transportation.publicTransit: Capital Metro bus system and MetroRail
transportation.biking: B-cycle bike share program and many bike lanes
transportation.walkability: Downtown and some neighborhoods are walkable
transportation.parking: Can be challenging downtown - consider public transit or rideshare

nightlife.note: Many venues allow 18+ with wristbands for alcohol

tips: Traffic can be heavy - plan extra time
Many restaurants don't take reservations - expect waits
Always have cash for food trucks
Live music happens every night of the week
Breakfast tacos are serious business here
SXSW and ACL make the city very crowded - book early

budgetGuideline.note: Food truck meals $8-15, restaurant meals $15-40, drinks $8-15
